DOC.brief_summary: This study will assess the efficacy of periodontal treatment in diabetic patient. Patients will be randomized in the periodontal group or in the control group. The control group will received a periodontal treatment after the study.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Periodontal Treatment on Glycaemic Control in Diabetic Patients
DOC.criteria: patient suffering from a periodontitis patient with : 7,0% < Hemoglobin A1c < 9,5% If an hospitalization is planned within the next 4 months Patient suffering from chronic infectious pathology (HIV, hepatitis C virus, hepatitis B virus, mononucleosis) Renal insufficiency Contra indication for amoxicilline or clindamycin Antithrombotic treatment Liver disease
